featured.text: Studies have proved that watching funny movies can reduce pain and promote healing.
The incident seemed funny 35 the time, but several months later it did not.
Some studies suggest that the act of shaping our mouths into a smile (creating a “physical smile”) can help us see the brighter, funnier side of things.
Children, (35) , can see the funny side of things more often and may laugh up to 400 times a day.

other.text: According to the passage, which of following is a positive effect of stress? (A) Watching funny movies.
Often they write about real or make-believe people, places, or events that may be funny, sad, or scary.

definition.example: The comedian told a funny joke that made everyone laugh.
